body.p: Use the Transport screen to access four other screens by pressing on the buttons at the bottom center of the screen:

section.title: X-Position Screen (Dashboard V button) This screen is divided into three regions.
section.p:
The blue left region shows a table with the section number, measured X-position, deviation in mm, and the pushout adjustment necessary to place the bottles on the optimum x-position.
Press on one of the section numbers to use the section as the reference.
By selecting All, the average of all sections is used as a reference
The middle graph shows the last measured x-position (white dot) and the variation of the x-position.
The right graph shows the x-position for each cavity.

section.title: Y-Position Screen (Dashboard Y button)
section.p: The upper graph shows the Y-position measurement of the section,
The lower graph shows the variation of the Y position.

section.title: X-Trend Screen (Overview button)
section.p: This screen shows the X-position of the bottles in a time graph.
